Operation 'bigquerydatapolicy.projects.locations.dataPolicies.setIamPolicy' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original summary was empty and description lacked critical details. Added: (1) explicit mention of IAM policy replacement behavior, (2) input schema context (SetIamPolicyRequest), (3) output details (returns Policy object), (4) side effect clarification that this replaces existing policy, and (5) domain-appropriate terminology consistent with API context. This helps AI agents understand when to use this operation and what to expect.

data.current_description: Sets the IAM policy for the specified data policy.
data.summary_suggestion: Set IAM policy for data policy resource
data.description_suggestion: Sets the Identity and Access Management (IAM) policy for the specified data policy resource. Accepts a SetIamPolicyRequest containing the policy bindings to apply. Replaces the existing IAM policy entirely. Returns the updated Policy object reflecting the new access control configuration. This operation modifies access permissions for the data policy resource.
data.reasoning: Original summary was empty and description lacked critical details. Added: (1) explicit mention of IAM policy replacement behavior, (2) input schema context (SetIamPolicyRequest), (3) output details (returns Policy object), (4) side effect clarification that this replaces existing policy, and (5) domain-appropriate terminology consistent with API context. This helps AI agents understand when to use this operation and what to expect.

message: Operation 'bigquerydatapolicy.projects.locations.dataPolicies.testIamPermissions' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary was empty and description was incomplete. Added: (1) explicit mention of input (TestIamPermissionsRequest with permission list), (2) output details (TestIamPermissionsResponse with subset of permissions), (3) clarification that this is a read-only operation with no side effects, and (4) use case context for AI agents. This enables agents to understand this is a permission validation operation and what to expect in the response.

data.current_description: Returns the caller's permission on the specified data policy resource.
data.summary_suggestion: Test caller permissions on data policy
data.description_suggestion: Tests which permissions the caller has on the specified data policy resource. Accepts a TestIamPermissionsRequest containing a list of permissions to check. Returns a TestIamPermissionsResponse listing only the permissions the caller possesses. Does not modify any resources. Useful for authorization checks before attempting operations.
data.reasoning: Original summary was empty and description was incomplete. Added: (1) explicit mention of input (TestIamPermissionsRequest with permission list), (2) output details (TestIamPermissionsResponse with subset of permissions), (3) clarification that this is a read-only operation with no side effects, and (4) use case context for AI agents. This enables agents to understand this is a permission validation operation and what to expect in the response.

message: Operation 'bigquerydatapolicy.projects.locations.dataPolicies.delete' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_side_effects. Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity about permanence of deletion and return value. Added context about irreversibility and empty response to help AI agents understand the destructive nature of this operation.

data.current_description: Deletes the data policy specified by its resource name.
data.summary_suggestion: Delete a data policy by resource name
data.description_suggestion: Deletes the data policy specified by its resource name. This operation permanently removes the data policy and cannot be undone. Requires the resource name of the data policy to be deleted. Returns an empty response on successful deletion.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity about permanence of deletion and return value. Added context about irreversibility and empty response to help AI agents understand the destructive nature of this operation.

data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a data policy by resource name
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the data policy specified by its resource name. Returns the complete DataPolicy object containing the policy configuration, including data masking rules, labels, and metadata.

message: Operation 'bigquerydatapolicy.projects.locations.dataPolicies.patch' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description lacks detail about input schema (DataPolicy), partial update support, and return value. Enhanced to clarify that this is a partial update operation and what the response contains.

data.current_description: Updates the metadata for an existing data policy. The target data policy can be specified by the resource name.
data.summary_suggestion: Update data policy metadata and configuration
data.description_suggestion: Updates the metadata and configuration for an existing data policy specified by its resource name. Accepts a DataPolicy object with fields to be updated. Supports partial updates - only provided fields will be modified. Returns the updated DataPolicy object with all current configuration.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks detail about input schema (DataPolicy), partial update support, and return value. Enhanced to clarify that this is a partial update operation and what the response contains.

data.current_description: Renames the id (display name) of the specified data policy.
data.summary_suggestion: Rename a data policy's display name
data.description_suggestion: Renames the display name (id) of the specified data policy. Requires the data policy resource name and a RenameDataPolicyRequest containing the new display name. Returns the updated DataPolicy object with the new display name applied.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is vague about inputs and outputs. Added clarity about RenameDataPolicyRequest schema and return value to help AI agents understand the required request structure and response.

data.current_description: List all of the data policies in the specified parent project.

data.current_description: Creates a new data policy under a project with the given `dataPolicyId` (used as the display name), policy tag, and data policy type.
data.summary_suggestion: Create a new data policy in a project
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new data policy under the specified project. Requires a DataPolicy object with dataPolicyId (display name), policy tag reference, and data policy type (e.g., data masking policy). Returns the newly created DataPolicy object with all configuration and metadata.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description uses backticks inconsistently and lacks clarity about return value. Improved terminology consistency and added information about the DataPolicy response to enhance AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Gets the IAM policy for the specified data policy.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve IAM policy for a data policy
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the Identity and Access Management (IAM) policy for the specified data policy. Requires the data policy resource name and optional GetIamPolicyRequest parameters. Returns a Policy object containing role bindings and access control rules for the data policy.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks information about request parameters and response structure. Added clarity about GetIamPolicyRequest and Policy response schema to help AI agents understand IAM policy retrieval.
